statement.p: In 40.74 of the last 27 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{27}}={0.4074}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{27}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4074}\cdot{27}={10.9998}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 27-10.9998=16.0002 We round that as requested to 16.
